org.jcatapult.filemgr.service
Interface FileConfiguration

All Known Implementing Classes:
DefaultFileConfiguration
public interface FileConfiguration

This class provides easy access to file manager configuration.

Method Summary
 String getFileServletDir()
           
 String getFileServletPrefix()
           
 String[] getFileUploadAllowedContentTypes()
           
 boolean isCreateFolderAllowed()
           
 

Method Detail

getFileServletDir

String getFileServletDir()
Returns:
The configuration parameter named jcatapult.file-mgr.file-servlet.dir or the default value of ${user.home}/data.

getFileServletPrefix

String getFileServletPrefix()
Returns:
The configuration parameter named jcatapult.file-mgr.file-servlet.prefix or the default value of /files.

getFileUploadAllowedContentTypes

String[] getFileUploadAllowedContentTypes()
Returns:
The configuration parameter named jcatapult.file-mgr.file-upload.allowed-content-types or the default value of new String[]{"image/jpeg", "image/png", "image/gif", "application/x-shockwave-flash", "application/pdf"}.

isCreateFolderAllowed

boolean isCreateFolderAllowed()
Returns:
The configuration parameter named jcatapult.file-mgr.create-folder-allowed or the default value of true.
